1.1.name: wordpress/fantastic-content-protector-free
1.1.description:
This Plugin will automatically protect the content of your WordPress site

Features

  1. Disables the Mouse Right Click
  2. Disables CTRL+C - Copy
  3. Disables CTRL+X - Cut
  4. Disables CTRL+V - Paste
  5. Disables CTRL+U - View Source
  6. Disables CTRL+A - Select All
  7. Disables CTRL+S - Save
  8. Disables Image Dragging

Fantastic Plugins Official Page

Join Fantastic Plugins to get a Free WordPress Plugins.

Pro Version with Advanced Text and Image Protection

Check out Ultimate Content Protector which has comprehensive Text and Image Protection options.

Support
